text: Zisas nzambara mpuanin Pita ga muuŋgiap, ana wom khegenen ana mbui. Ana wom khaŋ ana nzuai, “Saimon, Zonan kam, ndu na vuzvugire?” Pita ne mbararagiap, ana Zisas nzambara mpuanin ana muuŋgiap, ana wom khegenen ana muuŋgim, Pita ne nzuav ndav simgi. Pita ndav simgiap khaŋ ana nzuai, “Guma Bakɨme, ndu za kha bigi kaŋgi. Ndu kaŋgi, gu ndu vuzvugi.” Zisas mbara khaŋ ana nzuai, “Ndu mba gu bigir nan sipsivi ganɨri.
